name: WeRecover Wendi
author: werecover

sections.description: For providers part of the WeRecover platform, streamline your inquiry engagement through our automated chat widget. Gather relevant info from potential inquiries and provide instant feedback on eligibility.
sections.faq:
Who needs this plugin?

If you have a WeRecover provider account and wish to utilize our automated inquiry management on your wordpress site.

short_description: Place WeRecover Wendi automated chat tool in your wordpress powered sites.
description: For providers part of the WeRecover platform, streamline your inquiry engagement through our automated chat widget. Gather relevant info from potential inquiries and provide instant feedback on eligibility.

upgrade_notice.1.0: You must have this installed in order to properly load the latest Wendi widget.
